Hero.Info: We have state support for our patients

About.Title: Body examination clinic (check-up) and preventive medicine
About.Subtitle: Here, you will learn about the real state of your health, and we will also help you prevent the development of dangerous diseases through prevention.

Reason.Title: Why do we deserve your attention?

Cards.Title: Individual Approach
Cards.Description: We tailor treatment programs considering the personal characteristics and needs of each patient to ensure the most effective care.

Cards.Title: International Standards
Cards.Description: Our clinic adheres to high international standards in medical practice, utilizing cutting-edge technologies and methodologies.

Cards.Title: Prevention is the Best Cure
Cards.Description: We implement comprehensive preventive programs to reduce the risk of developing diseases and maintain your health at a high level.

Cards.Title: Modern Methods and Technologies
Cards.Description: Using innovative medical technologies and the latest scientific developments allows us to perform accurate diagnostics and effective treatment.

Cards.Title: Education and Support
Cards.Description: We provide educational materials and courses for patients to better understand their health and ways to maintain it.

Cards.Title: Saving Time and Costs
Cards.Description: Our methodologies reduce the time for diagnostics and treatment, lowering costs without compromising the quality of medical services.

ActionCall.Title: Sign up for a free online consultation with our doctor right now!
ActionCall.Description: We are always happy to help you in any situation
ActionCall.Extra: Here, you will learn about the real state of your health, and we will also help you prevent the development of dangerous diseases through prevention.

Cards.Title: Comprehensive Clinic Checkup
Cards.Description: A basic medical examination recommended for individuals aged 18 to 50. It includes tests and diagnostics to identify the most likely diseases and assess your overall health condition.

Cards.Title: Individual Clinic Checkup
Cards.Description: A personalized examination that considers your heredity, lifestyle, and individual risks. Ideal for detailed detection of diseases and planning of prevention.

Cards.Title: Individual Doctor Consultations
Cards.Description: Personal medical consultations that provide a deep analysis of your health condition and suitable methods for treating chronic diseases such as hypertension, diabetes, lung diseases, and digestive system disorders.

Cards.Title: Medical Use of Cannabis
Cards.Description: Diagnosis and treatment selection using medical cannabis to alleviate symptoms of chronic pain, anxiety, and other conditions in accordance with legislation.

Reviews.Title: What do our patients say about us?

Facts.Title: Just the facts about us in numbers, nothing more

Cards.Description: We strive to meet the highest international standards, continuously studying European experience and adapting it to our realities
years in the field of comprehensive medicine
average years of experience per doctor

FAQ.Title: Answers to frequently asked questions from our patients

Items.Title: What does a comprehensive checkup include?
Items.Description: Our comprehensive checkup includes a general examination, laboratory blood and urine tests, diagnostics of the main body systems (cardiovascular, respiratory, digestive), which helps to detect health risks at early stages.

Items.Title: How do I register and how do I use state support programs through NSZU at your VEKMED clinic?
Items.Description: To register, visit the registration page on our website or contact us via Instagram, Telegram, or email in a way that's convenient for you. After registration, we will help you complete all necessary documents and provide access to state-covered medical services.

Items.Title: How often should I undergo a medical examination?
Items.Description: We recommend undergoing a medical examination, or checkup, annually for better monitoring of your health and timely detection of possible health complications.

Items.Title: What are the main areas of preventive medicine you offer?
Items.Description: In our clinic, we focus on a comprehensive approach to maintaining your health. We offer regular medical checkups, consultations with a nutritionist, recommendations for physical activity, and individually tailored programs to maintain optimal vitality levels. We also provide advice on using natural remedies to improve your health, such as 5-HTP for mood support, melatonin for sleep regulation, zinc and magnesium for immune system support, and lion's mane extract for cognitive function enhancement.

Items.Title: What therapeutic services do you provide at VEKMED?
Items.Description: We offer a wide range of therapeutic services, including treatment of common diseases, management of chronic conditions such as hypertension and diabetes, and psychological support.

Items.Title: How can I get a consultation regarding medical use of cannabis at VEKMED?
Items.Description: If you are interested in using medical cannabis to treat your condition, you should first visit our clinic for a consultation with a qualified doctor. During the consultation, the doctor will assess your medical indications and determine if you are a suitable candidate for treatment with cannabis. After that, if deemed appropriate, the doctor will issue a prescription and provide instructions on dosage and safe use of cannabis.

Authorisation.fullNameRequired: Full name is required (at least 4 characters)
Authorisation.phoneRequired: Phone number is required (at least 11 characters)
Authorisation.passwordRequirements: Password must be 6-16 characters, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
